name: EAGLDrawable
desc: iOS objects that implement the EAGLDrawable protocol can be used as a rendering surface and displayed to the screen by an EAGLContext object. In iOS 2.0, this protocol is implemented only by the CAEAGLLayer class, but in the future other classes may choose to implement the protocol. The EAGLDrawable protocol is not intended to be implemented by objects outside of the iOS.

items.name: var drawableProperties: [String : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of values that specify the desired characteristics of the drawable surface.
